body: monad linux src monad monad src engine SessionStateNavigation.cs    RemoveQualifier  this causes the following command to fail in non windows systems  Split Path  usr bin  NoQualifier   Should Be  usr bin   instead, it expects typical windows drive qualifier of    , so it removes the first two characters of the drive.  Added changes.  Need to successfully merge submodule to git, and then merge supermodule to git.     8 24 15   this has been merged successfully. title: RemoveQualifier() method needs to be changed for linux
